text: Naa ɠa é ba, gè tɔgi zeiɗa, ga nu nɔpɛ é ɠula nuɓusɛiti saama, ta ziiti, ta zii wooiti, a Sadalake ta Mesake ta Aɓɛde-Negoni ta-ƓALAGI ná-fai zona ga yɔɔɠɛ faa, naama nui ɠa leʋeleʋe, é ɓulukpulu, ná-pɛlɛi ɠa lati é ɠɛ ga kpoɠamaʋɛ. Tɔɔzei gala kili nɔpɛ ge la ná, nii a zoo é nu ɠizo ga tɔun kɛʋele.»
